game.name: Ware's Laboratory
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Anti-piracy measures are now active. Your game has turned into a surreal nightmare. Crawl through corrupted levels, read notes from a malicious developer, and confront the dark past in multiple realities.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Anti-piracy measures are now active. Your game has turned into a surreal nightmare. Crawl through corrupted levels, read notes from a malicious developer, and confront the dark past in multiple realities.
